submissionTerms.title: Submission terms
submissionTerms.description: Information about the submission terms to describe how, when and where the tenderers must submit their bids for a tender.

submissionTerms.title: Submission terms
submissionTerms.description: Information about the submission terms to describe how, when and where the tenderers must submit their bids for a particular lot.

SubmissionTerms.title: Submission terms
SubmissionTerms.description: Information about the submission terms to describe how, when and where the tenderers must submit their bids.

electronicSubmissionPolicy.title: Electronic submission policy
electronicSubmissionPolicy.description: Whether tenderers are required, allowed or not allowed to submit bids electronically.

variantPolicy.title: Variant policy
variantPolicy.description: Whether tenderers are required, allowed or not allowed to submit tenders which fulfil the buyer's needs differently than as proposed in the procurement documents.

electronicCataloguePolicy.title: Electronic catalogue policy
electronicCataloguePolicy.description: Whether tenderers are required, allowed or not allowed to submit bids as electronic catalogues.

language.title: Submission language
language.description: One or several languages in which bids or requests to participate may be submitted, using either two-letter [ISO639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes), or extended [BCP47 language tags](http://www.w3.org/International/articles/language-tags/). The use of lowercase two-letter codes from [ISO639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes) is recommended.

bidMinimumValidityPeriod.title: Bid minimum valididity period
bidMinimumValidityPeriod.description: The period, from the bid submission deadline, for which bids must remain valid.

hasRequiredGuarantees.title: Guarantees required
hasRequiredGuarantees.description: Whether or not financial guarantees must be given.
